patthana17.11:1.1_0: Abyākataṁ parittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana17.11:2.1_0: Kusalaṁ mahaggataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha,
patthana17.11:2.1_1: adhipatiyā cha …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana17.11:3.1_0: Kusalaṁ appamāṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha,
patthana17.11:3.1_1: adhipatiyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
